channel.title: Exercises: HTML :: Introduction to Web Dev
channel.description: In this course, we will mostly use Firefox as our browser. If you haven’t installed Firefox, you can get it from Mozilla . Other browsers have good developer tools as well (Chrome, in particular) but we’re going to stick with Firefox. If you are more comfortable with another browser, you’ll find that most of the developer tools functionality exists in other browsers’ dev tools as well. Complete the HTML file for this simple web page. Open up javascript-projects/html/exercises. Add lines to index.html that do the following.
